website_summaries.verdict: This box is great for camping, fishing or hunting and is designed to stack.
pros: Interior gaskets designed to keep moisture out
Can be used with a padlock
Able to carry a lot of weight
Keeps things dry in the rain
cons: While this box will keep your gear dry in the weather, it is not tested for submersion
The latch can seem looser than other dry boxes

customer_reviews.title: Splash resistant but mine landed in the water and unlatched itself
customer_reviews.text: While the box sat in the kayak it could be splashed all day without issue. Unfortunately the latch doesn't engage with enough power and actually opened when the box fell off the kayak into water. Lost a camera and lens :( I wouldn't have faulted it if the latch had stayed engaged
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Different use for waterproof box..
customer_reviews.text: We had to have our beloved Princess put to sleep and cremated. I wanted a water proof box to bury her ashes. The box seems to be well constructed. Quick delivery and well packaged. I can't review if it truly is waterproof but trusting the manufacturer that it is waterproof and keeps my loving pet ashes dry for years to come. RIP Princess...
customer_reviews.author: Servant48

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy latch
customer_reviews.text: Overall disappointing container. The latch NEEDS a lock. Don’t even try to think you can leave one off. The latch is barely a latch and feels flimsy. I am uncomfortable loading this box and relying on the latch alone. There are other brands. I would recommend grabbing one with a better latch.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M DiLoreto

customer_reviews.title: Mostly OK, except for the latch
customer_reviews.text: The lid latch doesn't really close positively - not enough tension perhaps. I ended up using a small keychain size carabiner to secure it closed. Couldn't trust it to stay closed on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Not what I imagined on how it locks?
customer_reviews.text: I’m concerned how the latch does not lock down. It feels loose for this kind of locking box. I would think it would lock under pressure therefore don’t know if it would keep water out?
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: They leak
customer_reviews.text: I have them outside under a bench on a shelf. Every time I open them up there is a 1/4 inch of water. I have garden tools in them and not happy that they are still rusting.
customer_reviews.author: gpm

customer_reviews.title: good sturdy box!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these boxes for a number of years. They are very sturdy, well constructed fairly dust and water proof. Their construction is of a much heavier plastic than any of the big name brands. My only problem is you need to secure the latch so it doesn't pop open, thats the only reason it got a 4 and not 5 rating!
customer_reviews.author: dog bite

customer_reviews.title: Used as a sprinkler control box.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to house a sprinkler control box on my back porch. Old wood birdhouse that used to house it finally disintegrated so I bought this and mounted it to the same vinyl post and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Deane Woodland

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to build a portable battery power box for ham radio - it is the perfect size to fit 3 x 12 volt 12 amp hour batteries. For the very low price, this is a great box for this purpose. I will be buying more of these boxes.
customer_reviews.author: John in Kenya

customer_reviews.title: Tough s o b
customer_reviews.text: It's a good tough box, for the price it's an extremely good box I intentionally sank it in a tub of water and it is waterproof. This is a recommended purchase
customer_reviews.author: scott gamble

customer_reviews.title: perfect to hold Kreg pocket hole jig
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sturdy case to hold my Kreg pocket hole jig and accessories. Much sturdier and affordable compared to buying the Kreg case.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Zambo

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my stuff dry
customer_reviews.text: I store some medications in my box together with a desiccant. It maintains a low relative humidity which keeps my medications dry.
customer_reviews.author: CSTEINER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, weak seal...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a box to hold 12v12ah batteries. This one will fit 3 in the bottom with about an inch to spare on top. Perfect. The molding is thick enough to give it plenty of strength. The hinge and latch are ok. I knocked off a star because the seal could have been better. It is foam. I would say it's rain proof but not submersible. Pretty good box over all.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Actually, bought two, and he's quite happy with it. Now he can pull small things out of boxes and store them in one place. Even with a lot of weight, this is pretty durable and hasn't warped when picked up full. Also got him MTM 30 cal. ammo can and that one is great too. These two containers are pretty nice as they are stackable and you can just grab and go as needed. Has a place for a padlock, which I could see coming in handy. All in all, a great container for guys who are into specialty activities that would require such containers. Worth the money, unlike some of the ones you see at the sporting goods stores.
customer_reviews.author: LyndaK

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good utility
customer_reviews.text: Great utility box! Sturdy and what I expected. Not sure about the water tight seal, but it's not my intended use. As a designer, I believe the seal will do the job and keep the box afloat if it went overboard or dropped in the water from a water crossing. Hinges are good, lock hasp is ok and the latch is very good. Not as big as it sounds so you want to be careful of size.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These always work great. Just bought a new one to replace my old one that got gunked up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great to keep tools and anything you would like, its the perfect size where it fits anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good case.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good case. I have another that I have used for years. It is fairly sturdy, particularly for the price. I do not think it could be submerged.
customer_reviews.author: R. Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Secure and compact.
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked out perfectly for me! I use it for my diabetes supplies and medications, great to travel with. The right size and it is secure and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Solid box, but not as good as other Boater/Dry Boxes
customer_reviews.text: This is a good box, but the latch should be tighter. I went out and bought a safety pin because I was afraid the latch would always be getting opened accidently. Also, the water seal around the lip of the lid is only a piece of foam glued to the box instead of a rubber gasket like most boater/dry boxes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a tool box. Plenty of room, and it has a gasket. The hinge and handle are excellent. Rick/Pittsburgh
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E Johnson

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new waterproof box for my 13' Boston Whaler that I keep on top of our Hatteras.. Last box lasted 15 yrs and no reason to think this one would not either
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Does not latch securely
customer_reviews.text: The latching mechanism does not close securely. It basically flops around, even when in the closed and latched setting. Tilting the box towards the latch allows it to flop open, releasing the lid and spilling the contents, if you happen to be holding it by the handle. I would not recommend this container.
customer_reviews.author: N. Doren

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I like these boxes a lot. They are very very sturdy plastic. Not cheap at all. They are stackable and have a sturdy handle on them. One small complaint is that when you close the box, the latch does not "click" or "catch" as solidly as I would like. A very slight tug on the latch will release it. If you were out in the field, I could see this happening accidentally. There is a hole in the box/latch so that you can lock the latch closed however. Excellent product otherwise! I will surely buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Use this with my utility trailer to store my ratchet straps. Keeps them dry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time working with this box as you can tell. Really great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great utility box
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this box for some of his things he keeps in his workshop. He was super excited with the style and loved the over size and quality. He wants more and different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Clarke, RVA

customer_reviews.title: Tuff box does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I use this box to house the mechanical and electrical components for an adaptive fishing rod I make for quadriplegics. It is light weight and durable with a positive latch. The handle is strong enough to carry the weight of my components. My box travels around a lot and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pauwels

customer_reviews.title: Built solid
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband wanted. Built solid and seals tight. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JJJJ4

customer_reviews.title: OK but clasp doesn't shut tightly
customer_reviews.text: The box in general is just fine. The locking clasp isn't the best however and doesn't shut as tightly as it could. Form my purposes it will work.
customer_reviews.author: bluegoose

customer_reviews.title: Dents and scratches
customer_reviews.text: Solid box, gasket will fail. I’d give a 4, but arrived as obviously previously return.
customer_reviews.author: jamie98115

customer_reviews.title: Best, Heavy Duty Boxes I have Found
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are the best on the market in my opinion. Heavy duty molded plastic, with metal clasp and hinge pins on the Tall and Small boxes. (The "large" boxes do not appear to have a metal clasp in the product photos.) I have several of these Tall and small sizes in three colors. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Nice can
customer_reviews.text: Nice product I used mine for an upgraded toolbox behind my tractor seat. The hinge on the short side of the box allowed for the bigger width
customer_reviews.author: livefishunter

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Water seal is garbage, buy some water seal tape and replace it, other than that it's a great box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not latch well.
customer_reviews.text: The latch on this box is poorly designed and does not hold well, can easily be knocked open.
customer_reviews.author: Robyne H

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Durable, well built. Always a good choice to keep things dry. I just wish it would close a little tighter.
customer_reviews.author: ERM or SMM

customer_reviews.title: Terrible locking mechanism
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism/latch does not seal properly. There is a lot of wiggle room and the seal isn’t firmly sealing the lid/box.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Griner

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent. I have them in my car, truck, boat and shop. Been great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: It's a box...
customer_reviews.text: Eh, it's a box. What else can you say? I did but one of these years ago, and comparing the two side by side, I can see that the quality has gone down some with regarding to the hinges. That said, these are still very sturdy boxes.
customer_reviews.author: WWOOD70

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love the box. Use it everyday for work. Also use it as a step ladder. They last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 Products / i have quite a few of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Gr8 Products / i have quite a few of these , diff sizes and colors for boating and ammo and hunting....
customer_reviews.author: Jack in SC...

customer_reviews.title: Love these boxes
customer_reviews.text: Love these boxes. Perfect size for the proportional size and weight of ammo it will hold. Also very rugged construction. I wouldn't recommend storing the box under water though. Its just not that waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Hey TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the box
customer_reviews.text: I meets my expectation and the latch was a little weak to seal, but I knew that from other reviews. I will add a little to the latch to make it tighter. Very happy with the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy two.
customer_reviews.text: This ammo box is just right. A larger box would be too heavy when full. I have two, one for bullets and one for shotgun shells, and use them all the time. They would be great for anything you want to keep dry and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Utonian

customer_reviews.title: water resistant a
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT water tight, a "dry box" should be, by definition.
customer_reviews.author: Wade G.

customer_reviews.title: does not keep dry
customer_reviews.text: everything inside gets damp...I bought for use on my boat I take int off boat when not in use and everything gets damp
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is heavier than most and seals tightly.
customer_reviews.author: sam justus

customer_reviews.title: Has to be fastened shut....
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay closed without a bolt or something through the lock hole.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for my need
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this on the frame under my RV to store some sewer hose connections. Worked perfect for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holiday

customer_reviews.title: ... up to maybe three pounds after that it feels like the handle is going to come off
customer_reviews.text: Ok for lite weight stuff up to maybe three pounds after that it feels like the handle is going to come off
customer_reviews.author: Danny R. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great storage box
customer_reviews.text: Great storage box for the price. Solid hard plastic construction, water tight, easy to open and close, able to have a small padlock to keep it locked up. Good for ammo storage, or as a small tool box, gear box, hobby box, etc. It's just a little green box. It does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Toolbox replacement first rate
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for day-to-day tool box. Secure against opening in case of on site tumble. Easy to open compared to metal box replaced.
customer_reviews.author: tahanson43206

customer_reviews.title: Small, but Big
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, just what I was looking for...would buy from them again...5 stars...
customer_reviews.author: John Kully

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a bit, now. Keeps my straps dry and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: James P

customer_reviews.title: To keep things safe
customer_reviews.text: It's all what I need,but it took too long for delivery .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more wet tools!
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's working out well although a little bigger would be a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia B

customer_reviews.title: poor quality seal
customer_reviews.text: So the box is... boxy, but the seal is bad. I've not tested it yet but I can see I'm going to need to replace the whole seal with something better. Because the seal is low density open cell foam when I received the box it was completely flatened and the latch will bare stay closed. With a better seal I think the closure latch will work better also. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lentiman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Box, small but holds a lot I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little bit smaller than i thought but still very useful
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. The larger boxes either became too heavy or took up more space because they would be only 1/2 full. I've bought more of these to store "stuff" in because the first one worked so good.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: The box does exactly what I wanted it to do, only wish that a similiar but smaller one was available
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these boxes several years ago, but the store no longer carries them in stock, nor can they order one. It is exactly what I need and I would recommend this box to anyone in the boating field or does a lot of fishing or has a use the same or similar to mine.
customer_reviews.author: Musicman215

customer_reviews.title: Very lose tops
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The latch is a bit loose so it can open up on its own. Because of the loose tops, they ARE NOT waterproof at all. I purchased two and they both do the same thing. Still, they work for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

product_meta.title: Wise Outdoors Small Utility Dry Box
product_meta.description: Wise No.5601 Small Utility Box is Constructed of Thick Wall Injection Molded Plastic. Patterned after the US Armed Forces Ammo Box is the toughest Storage Box you will find. Heavy Duty Hinge Pins and Locking Latch System. Recessed Carry Handle, Special Molded in Retainers to Stack Box on Box. Lifetime Warranty. Outer Dimension 15" L x 7.75" W x 6.5" H, Inner Dimension: 12" L x 6" W x 4.75" D. Lifetime Warranty.
feature_bullets: Extra-thick co-polymer construction will not warp from sun, cold or rough handling
Unique MOLDED-IN retainers to stack boxes on top of one another, with true square inner sidewalls that allow gear to stack tight without shifting
Hand-laid lid gasket seals the inside from moisture to pretect gear from damage
Dimensions Outside: 15" Length, 7.75" Width, 6.5" Height; Dimensions Inside: 12" Length, 6" Width, 4.75" Depth
Strong reinforced steel pin hinge system and beefy carry handle that stores within lid

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
